# yoga-ui-col



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute | Description                                                            | Type               | Default     |
| ------------ | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `cols`       | `cols`    | The JSON stringified colums per breakpoint. Example: `cols="[12,6,4]"` | `number \| string` | `undefined` |
| `parsedCols` | --        | The parsed cols to use in JSX. Computed value.                         | `number[]`         | `undefined` |
